{"title": "Reiner Knizia's Poison", "title_search": "reiner knizias poison", "title_keyword": "reiner knizias poison", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/reiner-knizias-poison/", "summary": "REINER KNIZIA’S POISON  "When I have fifteen minutes to kill, Poison is one of the better ways to go! (Forgive the unintentional pun.)" - Tom Vasel, Boardgame Reviewer  From the mind of award-winning designer Dr. Reiner Knizia comes this simple and addictive card game!  It’s an exciting battle of skill, luck, and nerves in Reiner Knizia’s Poison. As potion-makers brewing magic elixirs, players play numbered Potion cards into one of three, colored cauldrons, being careful not to overfill them. The player who overfills the cauldron must take all of the cards that go with it, including any of the deadly Poison cards that were mixed in! Players with either the most or least of a Potion at the end of the game might just have a chance of surviving the potions lab and winning the game.  PEOPLE ARE SAYING  "All in all, I think that Reiner Knizia’s Poison is an excellent iPhone game. It is the right level of challenge that I want from my iPhone: something that is interesting, plays quickly, but can be put down easily if more pressing matters come up. The value you get for the low price of $2.99 makes this a worthwhile purchase. I highly recommend it for both German game fans and iPhone game enthusiasts." - Boardgamegeek.com review  GAME FEATURES  - Play against the computer in 4, 5, and 6 player games - Challenging AI enhances replayability - Atmospheric music and sound effects", "genre": ["Board"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2009-03-13", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-116384-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-116384-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Griptonite Games (Developer)", "Griptonite Games (Publisher)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}

Although the play is highly skilful, the fact that the moves rely on the roll of the dice introduces an element of luck allowing even a novice to win the odd game against a world champion. {"title": "Monkey Tennis", "title_search": "monkey tennis", "title_keyword": "monkey tennis", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/monkey-tennis/", "summary": "Like tennis?  Like monkeys?  Then you will love Monkey Tennis.  Monkey Tennis is a gesture controlled Tennis game played entirely using monkeys. Using swipes and flicks to run and play a variety of shots, it's the most fun, addictive and amusing tennis game available for your iPhone.  Monkey Tennis is rendered in 3D, and uses an advanced 3D physics engine, so it is also a very realistic tennis experience - despite the fact that you might be playing against a Chimpanzee.  You can swerve the ball, play lobs, drop shots, volleys, accurately aim your shots and vary power, all with simple swipe gestures. Out of the four cards in your hand, look for any cards with consecutive numbers to one of the discard piles. If you find one, you may play that card by flicking it to the discard pile.  4. Since time immemorial, warriors called musha have ruled the battlefield, granted supernatural power by their enchanted suits of armor - tsurugi.  Minato Kageaki is one such musha, driven by duty to don his crimson armor and challenge the greatest evils of an age. But though madmen and tyrants fall to his blade, never will he claim that his battle is right.  For the tsurugi he wields is cursed Muramasa, which five centuries ago brought ruin to the land, and innocent blood is the price it demands in exchange for its terrible might.  \"Where there are demons, I slay them. Where there are saints, I slay them.\"  These words are an oath, the unbreakable Law binding him to his armor. But they also tell the story of his past, and of the future to come. {"title": "Aqua Jigsaw", "title_search": "aqua jigsaw", "title_keyword": "aqua jigsaw", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/aqua-jigsaw/", "summary": "The deep blue ocean is calling out to you again. Wondering what we’re talking about?...Combine Koi Pond with Jigsaw and you’ll know! If ordinary Jigsaw is what you call fun, the first ever FLUID JIGSAW will leave you mesmerized as you catch a glimpse of splendid marine life right in the comforts of your home.   Adding an interesting twist to Jigsaw, we’ve brought in RIPPLE EFFECT to make the aquatic life come alive. Watch your screen ripple as you move the pieces around to complete the puzzle. If you liked applications like Koi Pond and Fluid, there’s a treat in store for you with Aqua Jigsaw. Ocean Blue, Sea Green, Rocky Lake, Maple Pond and Sand Grain backgrounds will soothe your eyes as you play. Relieve your cares in the ocean as you gaze at the floating Jigsaw and hear the water splash with the swish of a finger.   Ever wondered how it would feel to have the entire ocean in your palms? {"title": "ActionVerite", "title_search": "actionverite", "title_keyword": "actionverite", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/actionverite/", "summary": "_____________________________________________ _____________________________________________  --  INFORMATIONS SUR LA MISE À JOUR 1.1 --  - Pensez à aller voir dans les réglages de l'iPhone pour plus d'options (par exemple pour avoir que des questions de niveau élevé en jouant avec le niveau le plus élevé)  - Le niveau Coquin n'est effectivement pas coquin. Le nom du niveau est peut-être mal choisi en réalité. Il s'agit juste d'un niveau 3, avec des énoncés un peu osés mais encore corrects. Si vous voulez des énoncés plus "hot", c'est le niveau Courageux qu'il faut choisir.  - Le niveau Courageux contient de nouveaux énoncés plus chauds. Mais il ne s'agit toujours pas d'un niveau X. Je n'ai pas beaucoup de temps en ce moment, mais je réorganiserai bientôt les niveaux et rajouterai un niveau Hot pour tous ceux qui le demandent. _____________________________________________ _____________________________________________  Pimentez vos soirées en rejouant au jeu culte de votre adolescence, action ou vérité... sur iPhone.  Offrez-vous le jeu culte de vos premières soirées ! Prenez garde toutefois, les créateurs de cette application ont légèrement repoussé les limites... Serez-vous prêts à tout pour gagner la partie  Rentrez le nom des joueurs dans l'iPhone, choisissez votre niveau, de « fillette » à « courageux », l'application s'occupe du reste ! Près de 500 questions, actions et gages vous entraîneront dans un jeu où tout est possible! Du bisou sur la joue à la séance de lapdance, attendez-vous à découvrir vos amis comme vous ne les avez certainement jamais vus !  Et si vous refusez de répondre à une question ou de faire votre action, comme dans le jeu original, l'iPhone se chargera de vous donner un gage !
